description:
===============================================================================================
DESIGN AMAZING FACEBOOK COVERS IN <10 MINUTES USING POWERPOINT
===============================================================================================

IMPORTANCE OF FACEBOOK COVERS

Facebook covers are the centre of attention when users visit your Facebook page or profile. Which is why representing your brand effectively through the use of a cover image is one of the most important things to consider when setting up your Facebook channel. Since the cover photo is often the first thing users see when visiting your page(s), it’s the key to creating a lasting impression. 

===============================================================================================
NO EXPENSIVE SOFTWARE!

NO PRIOR EXPERIENCE NEEDED!
===============================================================================================

WHY TAKE THIS COURSE?

In this class, I’ll show you how to create amazing Facebook covers using free images, fonts, icons and shapes in Microsoft PowerPoint. By the end of this course, you'll be able to create Facebook covers not only for your page(s) but also be able to offer professional Facebook cover design services to clients across the globe. 

===============================================================================================So, enroll in this course if you haven’t already. I’ll see you on the other side!
===============================================================================================
title: How To Design Amazing Facebook Covers In PowerPoint
